mapper.select: select count(SMALL_CLUB_NUMBER) from tbl_small_club_member_applicant where SMALL_CLUB_NUMBER = #{smallClubNumber} and member_number = #{memberNumber}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_small_club_member_applicant(SMALL_CLUB_NUMBER, MEMBER_NUMBER, SMALL_CLUB_MEMBER_APPLY_DATE) values(#{smallClubNumber}, #{memberNumber}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT count(a.MEMBER_NUMBER) FROM TBL_SMALL_CLUB_MEMBER_APPLICANT a JOIN (SELECT SMALL_CLUB_NUMBER FROM TBL_SMALL_CLUB WHERE SMALL_CLUB_NUMBER = #{smallClubNumber}) r ON r.SMALL_CLUB_NUMBER = a.SMALL_CLUB_NUMBER
